data.title: THE FAA's Center of Excellence for UAS Research
data.meta_description: ASSURE is comprised of 24 of the world’s leading research institutions and more than a hundred leading industry and government partners. ASSURE members are core to three FAA UAS test sites, lead four FAA research centers, have seven airfields and a 340 UAS fleet — 24 more UAS than the USAF.

RESEARCH EXCELLENCE IS OUR CORE MISSION
